name: 5×8 Linear Progression
overview_and_execution: Perform 5 sets of 8 with the same load. Once you can handle all 5×8 confidently, add 5 lb next session.
example_application: Barbell Row: 5×8 @ 135 lb, progress to 140 lb next time if all sets are done with good form.
important_notes: Straightforward progressive overload. Good volume for hypertrophy without extremes.
